description: ZPS files are shared through Zebra Digital Assets' Neutral Cloud, a secure online storage location. To view the files within a ZPS archive, you must have been granted permission by the owner of the file, and then you can view it using the ZPS Explorer program.

ZPS archives allow fine-grained access control permissions specified by the archive owner. Each file or folder in the archive can have separate permissions, and the owner can grant permissions as well as revoke them at any time, even after a ZPS file has been shared with another user.
NOTE: You must have a Zebra Digital Assets account before creating, sharing, and viewing ZPS files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .zps file in Zoner Photo Studio X
images.caption: ZPS file open in Zoner Photo Studio X
